# TPC-DS Data Generation using Tez

1. **Build JAR:**

   ```bash
   mvn clean install
   ```

   This creates `target/TezTpcdsJob-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar`

2. **Prerequisites on Cluster:**

   * `dsdgen` executable (compiled for Linux x64).
   * `tpcds.idx` file (generated by dsdgen).
3. **Run:**

   ```bash
   export HADOOP_CLASSPATH=${TEZ_CONF_DIR}:${TEZ_JARS}/*:${HADOOP_CLASSPATH}

   hadoop jar target/tpcds-tez-gen-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar \
       com.example.tez.tpcds.TPCDSGenTez \
       /path/to/local/dsdgen \
       /path/to/local/tpcds.idx \
       100 \
       50 \
       /user/hadoop/tpcds_100g

   ```
